My Expertise

Hi there! I'm Sameer. A Graduate Information Technology student with a knack for programming and technology. I love working on challenging tasks and creating something new. When I'm not coding, I probably am cycling through the woods and mountains photographing the beautiful world we live in.

Featured Projects

Shield Whistleblower System

  • Built on Node.js, Sequelize and PostgreSQL.

Shield Whistleblower System is a secure and anonymous way to send evidence to news media outlets by people who want to bring evidence and news to light without the fear of threats to their life and identity.

Check it out

The Student Space

  • Built on Flask and PostgreSQL.

Designed a website to review and rate college teachers. Helps students make the best choice when it comes to selecting faculty members.

Check it out

Chat Room Application

  • Built on Node.js and socket.io

Created an application supporting dynamic chat rooms with status of persons visible to facilitate group chat. Built to help anonymous support groups.

Check it out

Wikipedia Viewer
